imdb.title: Edens Zero
imdb.plot: A young boy cut off from the world meets his friends and sets off on a hard, long journey to be reborn.

episodes.title: Into the Sky Where Cherry Blossoms Flutter
episodes.plot: Young Shiki Gazes into the sky fascinated by a comet. He Plans on finding Mother, a goddess of cosmos after Escaping Planet Granbell with Bcuber Rebecca and Happy on finding out that most of his robot friends suffer through a Virus.

episodes.title: A Girl and Her Blue Cat
episodes.plot: On their way to Blue Garden, Rebecca encourages Shiki to get his adventure license. She also asks him to be a bodyguard for her and Happy.

episodes.title: Adventurers
episodes.plot: Shiki loses his cool when famous B-Cuber Labilia makes fun of Rebecca's inferior B-Cube channel. Then, Shiki gets his official adventure license.

episodes.title: A Man Named Weisz
episodes.plot: On the planet Norma, where time is 50 years in the pest, Happy and Rebecca meet a young Professor Weisz, who long ago saved Happy's life.

episodes.title: Clash!! The Sibir Family
episodes.plot: Shiki and the gang break into Sibir's hideout to get Pino back, but Weisz takes advantage of the chaos to take Pino for himself.

episodes.title: The Skull Fairy
episodes.plot: While Shiki and the gang struggle to fly Aqua Wing off of Norma, Weisz suddenly appears and offers to help - but he wants something in return.

episodes.title: Warship of the Demon King
episodes.plot: After boarding the pirate ship Skull Fairy, Shiki makes his way to the bridge to confront Elsie Crimson and fight her for the vessel.

episodes.title: Wind Howls on the Highway
episodes.plot: Witch informs Shiki that he is now the master of the Edens Zero. She further explains that the ship has not yet returned to its full power.

episodes.title: Planet Guilst
episodes.plot: While Shiki and the others rush to rescue Rebecca, Weisz returns to Edens Zero along with a woman named Homura.

episodes.title: The Great Naked Escape
episodes.plot: Homura uses her Soul Blade powers to fight off Sister's men. Meanwhile, Rebecca plans her escape from Illega Tower.

episodes.title: Sister Ivry
episodes.plot: As the chronophage moves ever closer to Planet Guilst, Shiki is disgusted to see Sister use Jinn as a shield. Then, another Sister appears.

episodes.title: New Friends
episodes.plot: Witch and Sister Ivry finally reunite, and Homura reveals her true motivations for coming aboard Edens Zero.

episodes.title: The Super Virtual Planet
episodes.plot: After finding Hermit on Iron Hill, the crew deduces that she's in an abnormal sleep mode as a result of her heart being broken.

episodes.title: The Girl on the Hill
episodes.plot: The crew enters the virtual planet of Digitalis to search for Hermit, but when they find her, she stubbornly refuses to return to Edens Zero.

episodes.title: Great Kaiju Shiki
episodes.plot: After Homura declares that she's joining Drakken Joe, Shiki and the crew are shocked when another Homura suddenly appears.

episodes.title: Fireworks
episodes.plot: Spider hacks into Edens Zero's system and starts to destroy the ship from the inside. The only one who can stop him is Hermit.

episodes.title: The Temple of Knowledge
episodes.plot: To find the fourth member of the Demon King's Four Shining Stars, Shiki and the crew head for the Planet of Time, Mildian.

episodes.title: Words Will Give You Strength
episodes.plot: At the Battle Coliseum, Xiaomei tells Shiki and the crew that she'll give them the information they want - but only if they can defeat their opponents.

episodes.title: From the Planet of Eternity
episodes.plot: After obtaining the information they needed from Xiaomei, Edens Zero sets course for the planet of Sun Jewel to reunite Homura with her mentor.

episodes.title: Stones
episodes.plot: Shiki and Homura find themselves in a labor zone where they're forced to gather valuable metal for a figure known as Madame Kurenai.

episodes.title: Reset
episodes.plot: Nino leads Rebecca, Pino and Happy to the labor zone where they meet a man named Paul, who tells them he's Valkyrie's disciple.

episodes.title: My Mother, the Machine
episodes.plot: When Homura was a child on a war-torn planet, Valkyrie took her under her wing and raised her like her own.

episodes.title: Until the Day It Turns to Strength
episodes.plot: Shiki and the others confront Madame Kurenai. Homura is overwhelmed with sadness when she sees Valkyrie while Drakken Joe hacks into Oculus Kurenai.

episodes.title: Taking Up the Torch
episodes.plot: Baku is easily defeated, thanks to Weisz's Arsenal suit. While Shiki battles the Knight Gear controlled by Madame Kurenai, Rebecca fights Nino.

episodes.title: Someone to Love
episodes.plot: After the battle between the Kurenai Dragoon and Shiki comes to an end, Shiki and the others return to the Edens Zero and have to share some bad news.
